title: The Health Workshop
description: A 100% vegetarian/vegan health food shop and complete holistic center. Shop sells a large range of foods including made-in-house raw, vegan items plus custom ordering is available. Smoothies, juices, raw vegan cheesecakes (wheat, dairy, refined sugar free), selection of bars, brownies and biscuits as well as a range of nuts, seeds and dried fruits, shampoos, organic natural skincare and handmade soaps. Vegetarian and often raw and vegan supplements. Stocks Superfoodies products (from raw cacao to wheatgrass, etc). Holistic therapies include yoga, pilates, reflexology, therapeutic drumming, Reiki, hypnotherapy and more. Check with them to see when raw food workshops and evening events are available.
streetAddress: 4 Rushtons Yard, Ashby de la Zouch
